faq.title: Common questions
faq.subtitle: Clear answers to help you decide.
faq.a1: We cover design, development and marketing within one team.
faq.q2: What types of companies do you work with?
faq.a2: Startups, growing businesses and established companies. Projects of different scale and complexity.
faq.q3: Can I order only one service?
faq.a3: Yes. You can work with us on design, development or marketing separately.
faq.a4: Pricing depends on scope, complexity and timeline. We prepare an individual estimate after a short discovery call.
faq.a5: No. We always match the scope to your project needs. You can choose design, development, marketing or any combination.
faq.q6: What does the collaboration process look like?
faq.a6: Discovery, design, development, optional marketing, launch and support.
faq.q7: Do you offer support after launch?
faq.a7: Yes. We provide ongoing support, improvements and scaling if needed.
faq.q8: How do I start working with you?
faq.a8: Simply contact us through the form and we will get back to you shortly.
